articles.author: Abid Ahsan Shanto
articles.title: Sketchy Nintendo Switch 2 listing reveals the gaming handheld's pre-order price - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: While the Nintendo Switch 2 was fully showcased, its official price still remains a mystery. Ahead of any official words from the company, a lesser-known European retailer has revealed the pre-order price of the gaming handheld.
articles.content: Nintendo officially announced the Switch 2 on January 16, and through the first-look trailer, the company has given a detailed look at the gaming handheld. Now, while the video showcased the design a… [+1360 chars]
